definitions.definition: A vegetable with a nutritious , juicy , sweet root that is often orange in colour, Daucus carota , family Apiaceae , especially the subspecies sativus .
A shade of orange similar to the flesh of most carrots (also called carrot orange).
Any motivational tool; an incentive to do something.
A police officer from somewhere within the British Isles, but specifically outside of Greater London.

main_definition: A vegetable with a nutritious , juicy , sweet root that is often orange in colour, Daucus carota , family Apiaceae , especially the subspecies sativus .
secondary_definitions: A shade of orange similar to the flesh of most carrots (also called carrot orange).
( figurative ) Any motivational tool; an incentive to do something.
( UK , slang , derogatory ) Someone from a rural background.
( UK , slang ) A police officer from somewhere within the British Isles, but specifically outside of Greater London.
( slang ) A redhead ; a ginger -haired person
